block.p: OBERMAN-Hyman (Hy). On May 7th, of Lynbrook, NY. Beloved husband of Gertrude for 62 years. Devoted father of Susan and Michael Koral, Michael and Sharon Oberman. Loving grandfather of Howard and Pam Greenstein, Todd and Shari Greenstein and Abby Oberman. Doting greatgrandfather of Brooke Greenstein and Allyson Greenstein. Graveside services May 9, at 10:30AM, at Mount Ararat, Farmingdale, NY.
